attributes.action: we want a cycling route on the seafront in portsmouth linking gosport ferry to hayling ferry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
portsmouth city council promise a cycling route since 2003. 4000 people voted at the last consultation in 2009 for be allowed to cycle on the promenade, still the council want the option to do nothing.

if you want a cycling route linking the both ferry, on the road or the promeade, to able all cyclist to be safer. sign the petition.
